divs: Sighting DetailsSleeping outdoors with neighbor school friends when disc appeared and hovered over house. Disc was silent and approximately 100 ft. in diameter. UFO hunters is a reality series joke. Hope you are a better group to express this with. It definitely was silent and not anything I had ever seen before.
